    Map.Entry<Integer, Card> entry = it.next();
    int key = entry.getKey();
    Card card = entry.getValue();
    Card temp = card;
    card = deck.get(key);
    deck.put(key, temp);
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use the entrySet() method of the HashMap to get a set of all key-value pairs in the map, and then use an iterator to iterate through the set. In each iteration, you can get the key and value of the current entry, swap the values, and then put the original value back into the map. This will effectively shuffle the values in the HashMap.
